mapper.select: SELECT third.trade_date, first.ts_code, basic.symbol, basic.name, basic.industry, third.open, third.high, third.low, third.close, third.vol, third.amount FROM ( -- 第一天 大阴线 SELECT ts_code, close, low, vol FROM daily WHERE trade_date = #{firstDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND open > close AND (open - close) / (high - low) > #{firstThreshold,jdbcType=DOUBLE} ) AS first JOIN ( -- 第二天 实体较小,跳空开盘,收盘价小于昨天收盘价 SELECT ts_code, open, close, vol FROM daily WHERE trade_date = #{secondDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AS second ON first.ts_code = second.ts_code JOIN ( -- 第三天 大阳线,收盘价大于第一天收盘价 SELECT ts_code, open, close, vol, amount, high, low, trade_date FROM daily WHERE trade_date = #{thirdDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND (close - open) / (high - low) > #{thirdThreshold,jdbcType=DOUBLE} ) AS third ON first.ts_code = third.ts_code JOIN ( SELECT ts_code, symbol, name, industry FROM stock_basic WHERE market IN ('主板','创业板') ) AS basic ON first.ts_code = basic.ts_code WHERE second.open < first.low AND second.close < first.close AND third.close > first.close AND third.vol > second.vol AND third.vol > first.vol ORDER BY third.amount DESC

SELECT second.trade_date, first.ts_code, basic.symbol, basic.name, basic.industry, second.open, second.high, second.low, second.close, second.vol, second.amount FROM ( -- 第一天 大阴线 SELECT ts_code, close, low, vol FROM daily WHERE trade_date = #{firstDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND open > close AND (open - close) / (high - low) > #{firstThreshold,jdbcType=DOUBLE} ) AS first JOIN ( -- 第二天 实体较小,跳空开盘,收盘价小于昨天收盘价 SELECT ts_code, trade_date, high, low, open, close, vol, amount FROM daily WHERE trade_date = #{secondDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AS second ON first.ts_code = second.ts_code JOIN ( SELECT ts_code, symbol, name, industry FROM stock_basic WHERE market IN ('主板','创业板') ) AS basic ON first.ts_code = basic.ts_code WHERE second.open < first.low AND second.close < first.close ORDER BY second.amount DESC

SELECT a.trade_date ,a.ts_code ,b.symbol ,b.name ,b.industry ,a.open ,a.high ,a.low ,a.close ,a.vol ,a.amount FROM ( -- 限制当天锤子线 SELECT ts_code ,trade_date ,amount ,open ,high ,low ,close ,vol FROM DAILY WHERE trade_date BETWEEN #{beginDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ABS(open-close)/(high-low) <= #{threshold,jdbcType=DOUBLE} AND ABS(LEAST(high-open,high-close)/(high-low)) <= 0.1 ) AS a JOIN ( SELECT ts_code ,name ,industry ,symbol FROM stock_basic WHERE market IN ('主板','创业板') ) AS b ON a.ts_code = b.ts_code ORDER BY a.amount DESC

SELECT trade_date, ts_code, amount, open, high, low, close, vol, pct_chg, pre_close, name, industry, symbol FROM ( SELECT trade_date, ts_code, amount, open, high, low, close, vol, pct_chg, pre_close, name, industry, symbol, rank() over(PARTITION BY ts_code ORDER BY close DESC) AS rank_num FROM ( SELECT a.ts_code, a.trade_date, a.amount, a.open, a.high, a.low, a.close, a.vol, a.pct_chg, a.pre_close, b.name, b.industry, b.symbol FROM daily AS a JOIN ( SELECT ts_code, name, industry, symbol FROM stock_basic WHERE market IN ('主板', '创业板') ) AS b ON a.ts_code = b.ts_code WHERE a.trade_date BETWEEN date_format(date_sub(#{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, interval 2 year),'%Y%m%d') AND #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AS a ) AS a WHERE a.rank_num = 1 AND a.trade_date = #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY amount DESC

SELECT a.ts_code ,a.trade_date ,a.amount ,a.open ,a.high ,a.low ,a.close ,a.vol ,a.pct_chg ,a.name ,a.industry ,a.symbol FROM ( SELECT a.ts_code ,a.trade_date ,a.amount ,a.open ,a.high ,a.low ,a.close ,a.vol ,a.pct_chg ,b.name ,b.industry ,b.symbol FROM daily AS a JOIN ( SELECT ts_code ,name ,industry ,symbol FROM stock_basic WHERE market IN ('主板','创业板') ) AS b ON a.ts_code = b.ts_code WHERE a.trade_date = #{date, jdbcType = VARCHAR} AND a.close > a.pre_close ) AS a JOIN ( SELECT a.ts_code ,MAX(a.close) AS max_close FROM daily AS a JOIN ( SELECT ts_code ,name ,industry ,symbol FROM stock_basic WHERE market IN ('主板','创业板') ) AS b ON a.ts_code = b.ts_code WHERE a.trade_date BETWEEN date_format(date_sub(#{date, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, interval 2 year), '%Y%m%d') AND #{date, jdbcType = VARCHAR} GROUP BY a.ts_code ) AS b ON a.ts_code = b.ts_code WHERE b.max_close > a.close AND (b.max_close-a.close)/a.close <= #{threshold, jdbcType = DOUBLE} ORDER BY a.amount DESC
